hints.content:
Let's use a place value chart to write $\maroonD{\text{eight hundred}} \redD{\text{ seven thousand,}} \blueD{\text{ eight hundred}} \purpleC{\text{ twenty-}}\greenD{\text{five}}$ in standard form.

Hundred thousands | Ten thousands | Thousands | Hundreds | Tens |  Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:
$\maroonD8$ | $0$ | $\redD7$| $\blueD8$ | $\purpleC2$ | $\greenD5$
"Eight hundred seven thousand, eight hundred twenty-five" in standard form is $807{,}825$.
